title: 21 Days In Maui: How I gave myself permission to be free.
description: Unfulfilled by her corporate career and on the verge of divorce, P.L. Como saved every vacation day she could rustle up to get away and clear her mind. The Three weeks. In Maui. By herself. If that didn't do it, she would resort to hallucinogens.Her quest brings her on colorful adventures with interesting people in enchanting settings, but the true journey was taking place within. With a playful spirit and a ready heart, she pushes past self-imposed barriers, her own self-doubt, and other people’s opinions, to reclaim the wisdom that was there all along.Like international best seller Eat, Pray, Love, Como’s memoir inspires readers to explore life’s most important questions while traveling with her on a path of love, wonder, truth, and beauty.
author: P.L. Como
